content: I've just been trying to write some tooling using the rustdoc json, and I'm wondering if it's correct that external blanket impls on local types get a crate_id: 0
I would expect those to be identified as coming from the external crate that actually defines the impl
I think rustdoc just unconditionally marks blanket/auto impls as being locally
Hmm, I wonder if this could end up fixing some cross-crate bugs...
